replies.body:
Sorry to burst your bubble but you only get a clone if you kill an enemy CHAMPION.

I'm sorri TwT

(dragon) sobs in the corner

(herald) reads everypatch in fear of the one day
Would be actually pretty cool, with Drake as Long-Range Sieging Option and Harold as Damage on some Hard-CCed Enemies.
In Heroes of the Storm, you can get large monsters that immediately push down lanes and focus players- jump, cc, burst, then auto. You could have Herald do that?
Yeah, i actually thought of the Punishers when i wrote about that.
THEY SHOULD DO THIS! Omg, league players finally experience terror because a monster whats to chase. I would be so happy :D
omg i want the herald to smack them like the dragon from HOTS (like poppy ult) hahahahaha
For that matter- I'm fairly sure Yorick's ghost can't block a Jhin ult- which made me very sad recently.
As far as I know Morde's clone as well as Yorick's clone can block Jhin's ultimate.
{{champion:420}}  Test of spirit stops it as  well. Even body blocks his W. i've lost a handful of stuns from an Illaoi pulling a spirit to body block right as i fire it off...

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6zxtUBOi,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-03-02T19:17:12.287+0000)
>
> Sorry to burst your bubble but you only get a clone if you kill an enemy CHAMPION.
> 
> I'm sorri TwT

THAT MEANS YOU'VE THOUGHT ABOUT IT!

OP is a genius

But most (if not all) 'on champion' effects work on any kind of clones. 

Yet clones are something different as they draw turret aggro above minions. T-T
But you can do the opposite.

2 spooky for me

ps they all apply duckblade passive ({{item:3147}} )

>duckblade {{item:3147}} 

xD
Quack
Quack
Ah yes, the great Duckblade of Quacktharr, a great item, interesting stats, like the 75 AD, 5% MS when in the river, its 10 beak penetration, and its unique passive FeatherFall

> [{quoted}](name=TehJ0kur,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6zxtUBOi,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-03-02T22:43:23.859+0000)
>
> Ah yes, the great Duckblade of Quacktharr, a great item, interesting stats, like the 75 AD, 5% MS when in the river, its 10 beak penetration, and its unique passive FeatherFall

Honestly Duckblade of Quacktharr is a better name.
{{champion:15}} Did someone say duck?

No, sorry, next time I'll give you a heads up
(only people who know {{champion:15}} quotes when using q will understand)
So anyone that has ever played bots?
I don't know if I can Take this! anymore.
You just gotta charge through it man. Though, {{champion:15}} isn't the most articulate champion for quotes. After all, when you ask her to spell something, all she can do is spell shield
Xpecial Interaction: after buying Duckblade of Quacktharr, {{champion:15}} will quack everytime she triggers the passive/ get a kill
{{champion:75}} oh look, more stacks
Nasus... I don't know hot to say this, but those stacks aren't real.
{{champion:75}} arrrgghh no one understands me, why cant you see what im going throught !!!! (-slams the door and cuts himself while listening to my chemical romance-)
thanks for the idea guy
Anyone else scan through the comment section for Malicious Metal's reply to posts that are made about him or Morde?

Yeah.
I haven't found him yet though.

Technically, Mord's ghost is considered a champion. So the real question:

Can Mord make a ghost, of an enemy Yorik's Ghost of an enemy Mord's ghost, of an allied Yorik's Ghost, of a Shaco clone.

*{mic drop}*
Meanwhile in the corner, Mordekaiser mains already know.
Spooky Gangplank

Spooklesticks

Aaahh, that's hilarious
+1 :D

A friend and I used to play Yorick and Shaco, he'd play Yorick top, and I'd play Shaco jungle,  and we could take baron so early with just us two, technically. I'd ult, he'd ult me, so we'd have 4 people and 1-2 Shaco jitb's smacking away at baron. It was so fucking funny.

OMG I want to try it now lmao Mordekaiser ult on yorick's ult of Shaco's ult :)
